summary: This is an email forwarding a letter from Chief Deputy Attorney General Clara Moran regarding the continued investigation into possible collaborators of Jeffrey Epstein. It provides access instructions to case materials stored on a secure server, with the link set to expire on October 16, 2019.

persons.name: Clara Moran
persons.context: Author of the attached correspondence regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's collaborators. Her letter is being forwarded to the recipients.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure whose possible collaborators are under investigation, as referenced in the email subject and body.

connections.description: Clara Moran, as Chief Deputy Attorney General, is overseeing the continued investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's possible collaborators.

events.title: Forwarding of Investigation Materials
events.description: An email is sent forwarding correspondence from Chief Deputy Attorney General Clara Moran regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's collaborators, along with access instructions to related files.

events.title: Access Link Expiration
events.description: The secure link providing access to the investigation materials referenced in Clara Moran's letter is set to expire.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from September 17, 2019, forwarding a letter from Chief Deputy Attorney General Clara Moran.
The subject matter is the continued investigation into possible collaborators of Jeffrey Epstein.
Access to investigation materials is provided via a secure link and password, with an expiration date of October 16, 2019.
Physical materials (a CD) are also being sent via U.S. Mail.
The correspondence indicates an active, ongoing investigative effort by a state Attorney General's office into Epstein's network.
